Test Cases.Title: Verify Homepage Navigation
Test Cases.Objective: To ensure all navigation links on the Amazon.com homepage are functional and lead to the correct pages.

Step 1.Expected Result: The Amazon homepage is displayed correctly.

Step 2.Action: Click on each navigation link in the top navigation bar (All, Today's Deals, Buy Again, Customer Service, Registry, Gift Cards, Sell).
Step 2.Expected Result: Each link should navigate to the corresponding section/page on Amazon.com.

Step 3.Action: Verify the user account information section (Hello, Sanskruti, Account & Lists, Returns & Orders, Cart) displays correctly.
Step 3.Expected Result: User's name and account links should be visible and functional.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Homepage Banner and Sections
Test Cases.Objective: To ensure all banner advertisements and product sections on the Amazon.com homepage are displayed correctly and functional.

Step 2.Action: Verify the "Shop Books" banner is displayed with relevant content and a call to action.
Step 2.Expected Result: Banner is visible, and text/images are clear and appropriate.

Step 3.Action: Click on any product from the four featured sections ("Pick up where you left off", "Shop for your home essentials", "Get your game on", "Top categories in Kitchen appliances").
Step 3.Data: Any product from a featured section.
Step 3.Expected Result: The page redirects to the selected product's page successfully.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Amazon.in Redirect
Test Cases.Objective: To ensure the message prompting users to shop on Amazon.in for faster delivery is displayed correctly and the link is functional.

Step 2.Action: Verify the message suggesting shopping on Amazon.in for faster delivery is displayed.
Step 2.Expected Result: Message is visible and clearly communicates the suggestion.

Step 3.Action: Click on the Amazon.in link (if present).
Step 3.Expected Result: The page redirects to the Amazon.in homepage successfully.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Search Functionality
Test Cases.Objective: To validate the search bar's auto-suggest feature and search results on the Amazon India app.

Step 3.Expected Result: The app displays relevant search results for 'laptop stand'.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Personalized Recommendations
Test Cases.Objective: To validate that the 'Pick up where you left off' section displays recently viewed items correctly.

Step 2.Action: Verify the 'Pick up where you left off' section is displayed.
Step 2.Expected Result: Section is visible and contains previously viewed items.

Step 3.Action: Click on one of the items in 'Pick up where you left off'.
Step 3.Expected Result: The app navigates to the selected item's product page.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Header Information
Test Cases.Objective: To validate the accuracy and functionality of information displayed in the app header.

Step 2.Action: Verify that the location information (Deliver to Sanskruti, Pune 411005) is correct.
Step 2.Expected Result: Location information matches the user's profile settings.

Step 3.Expected Result: The app navigates to the user's account page.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Product Page Information
Test Cases.Objective: To ensure all product details are correctly displayed on the JOYEKY Laptop Stand page.

Step 1.Action: Navigate to the JOYEKY Laptop Stand product page.

Step 2.Action: Verify that product title, description, images, customer reviews, price, and color options are displayed accurately.
Step 2.Expected Result: All product information is accurate and complete.

Step 3.Action: Verify that clicking 'See more' under compatible models displays additional compatible models.
Step 3.Expected Result: A detailed list of compatible models is displayed.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Add to Cart Functionality
Test Cases.Objective: To ensure the 'Add to Cart' button functions correctly.

Step 1.Action: Navigate to the JOYEKY Laptop Stand product page.

Step 2.Expected Result: A success message is displayed (e.g., 'Added to Cart') and the cart count increases.

Step 3.Action: Verify that the item is added to the cart.
Step 3.Expected Result: The item appears in the shopping cart with the correct quantity and price.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Navigation on Product Page
Test Cases.Objective: To ensure all navigational elements on the product page are functional.

Step 1.Action: Navigate to the JOYEKY Laptop Stand product page.

Step 2.Expected Result: The page redirects to the search results page.

Step 3.Action: Click the 'Visit the JOYEKY Store' link.
Step 3.Expected Result: The page redirects to the JOYEKY store page.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Product Page Details and Coupon
Test Cases.Objective: To verify the accuracy of product information and the functionality of the coupon.

Step 1.Action: Navigate to the JOYEKY Laptop Stand product page.

Step 2.Action: Verify that all product information (price, description, images, reviews, etc.) is displayed correctly.
Step 2.Expected Result: All product information is accurate and complete.

Step 3.Action: Verify that the 10% coupon is displayed and its details are accurate. Attempt to apply coupon and note any result.
Step 3.Expected Result: Coupon details are clear.  Application results appropriately display whether coupon applies or not.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Shipping Restrictions Message
Test Cases.Objective: To verify that the shipping restriction message is displayed correctly when applicable.

Step 1.Action: Navigate to the JOYEKY Laptop Stand product page.

Step 2.Action: Verify that the shipping restrictions message is displayed, indicating the item cannot be shipped to the selected location.
Step 2.Expected Result: Message is clearly visible and accurately reflects the shipping restrictions.

Step 3.Action: Attempt to add the item to cart and observe result.
Step 3.Expected Result: Appropriate message or error is displayed if adding to cart is not possible.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Seller Information
Test Cases.Objective: To verify that the seller information is displayed accurately on the product page.

Step 1.Action: Navigate to the JOYEKY Laptop Stand product page.

Step 2.Action: Verify that the seller information (Amazon.com, Jiexunke Electronic) is displayed correctly.
Step 2.Expected Result: Seller information is clearly visible and accurate.

Step 3.Action: Verify seller rating is displayed (if available).
Step 3.Expected Result: Seller rating is visible and accurate if available.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Add to Cart Confirmation
Test Cases.Objective: To verify that the 'Added to Cart' confirmation message and visual cue are displayed correctly after adding an item to the cart.

Step 1.Action: Add the Grey laptop stand to the cart.
Step 1.Expected Result: Item is added to cart successfully.

Step 2.Action: Verify that the 'Added to cart' message is displayed.

Step 3.Action: Verify that the confirmation checkmark icon is displayed.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Item Details in Confirmation
Test Cases.Objective: To ensure that the item details (image and color) in the confirmation screen are correct.

Step 1.Action: Add the Grey laptop stand to the cart.
Step 1.Expected Result: Item is added to cart successfully.

Step 2.Action: Verify that the image of the Grey laptop stand is displayed correctly.

Step 3.Action: Verify that the color of the laptop stand is correctly indicated as 'Grey'.

Test Cases.Title: Verify Navigation After Adding to Cart
Test Cases.Objective: To verify that after adding an item to the cart, users can easily navigate to the cart or continue shopping.

Step 1.Action: Add the Grey laptop stand to the cart.
Step 1.Expected Result: Item is added to cart successfully.

Step 2.Action: Verify that a link or button is provided to view the cart.

Step 3.Action: Click on the cart link/button.  Verify correct page load.
Step 3.Expected Result: User is redirected to the shopping cart page successfully.
